name: angkor-ui

@comment scripts.start: This script starts the server using 'ng serve'
@comment scripts.mock: This script runs the json-server for mocks
@comment scripts.test: This script runs the test suite(s) using jest
about: This comment is about the `about` script.
It is wrapped in an array to allow line formatting
@comment workaround: https://stackoverflow.com/a/58385464/4292075 (since JSON does not allow comments)

scripts.test:clear: npx jest --clear-cache && echo you may also want to rm yarn.lock and reinstall

//engines-comment: Keep versions in sync with https://github.com/angular/angular/blob/master/package.json (appropriate tag)

engines.npm: Please use yarn instead of NPM to install dependencies

//dependencies-comment-caret: ^version: Relaxed (preferred), Compatible with version, *MINOR and PATCH* will be updated to all future versions, but not MAJOR
//dependencies-comment-tilde: ~version: Stricter (if needed), Approx. equivalent to version, only *PATCH* will be updated to all future versions, but not MINOR and MAJOR
//dependencies-comment-angular: For angular compatibility to typescript, rxjs etc. check: https://github.com/angular/angular/blob/master/package.json + https://angular.io/guide/versions
